text: Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Call of Duty: Warzone and Valorant. The build quality of the Refurbished: Acer Predator Helios 500 PH517-61-R0GX 17.3" 144 Hz IPS AMD Ryzen 7 2nd Gen 2700 (3.20 GHz) AMD Radeon RX Vega 56 16 GB Memory 256 GB SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Grade A Gaming Laptop is solid, and the trackpad is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Elden Ring and Apex Legends. The build quality of the Refurbished: Acer Predator Helios 500 PH517-61-R0GX 17.3" 144 Hz IPS AMD Ryzen 7 2nd Gen 2700 (3.20 GHz) AMD Radeon RX Vega 56 16 GB Memory 256 GB SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Grade A Gaming Laptop is solid, and the fan noise is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for streaming games. The Intel Core R0 in the Refurbished: Acer Predator Helios 500 PH517-61-R0GX 17.3" 144 Hz IPS AMD Ryzen 7 2nd Gen 2700 (3.20 GHz) AMD Radeon RX Vega 56 16 GB Memory 256 GB SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Grade A Gaming Laptop is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.
